notice.ch: 與AG7109活動構造專題討論III合班授課

department.ch: 應用地質研究所碩士班

remark.ch: 與AG7109活動構造專題討論III合班授課

goal.ch: To expand knowledge on active faults topics, to acquire the ability to critically read and understand a scientific article and to develop presentation skills.
goal.en: To expand knowledge on active faults topics, to acquire the ability to critically read and understand a scientific article and to develop presentation skills.

outline.ch: Study and present scientific articles in the field of active fault studies (earthquake geology, paleo- seismology, present-day crustal deformation, tectonic geomorphology, structural geology, regional tectonics, earthquake hazard, fault-displacement hazard…)
outline.en: Study and present scientific articles in the field of active fault studies (earthquake geology, paleo- seismology, present-day crustal deformation, tectonic geomorphology, structural geology, regional tectonics, earthquake hazard, fault-displacement hazard…)

gradMethod.ch: "Article report and understanding (40%), slides design and presentation skills (30%), discussion (20%), overall participation in the class (10%)"
gradMethod.en: "Article report and understanding (40%), slides design and presentation skills (30%), discussion (20%), overall participation in the class (10%)"

flexDiscription.ch:
Field geology survey
Online data reading
flexDiscription.en:
Field geology survey
Online data reading

ch: 系所:限應用地質研究所碩士班、應用地質研究所博士班。
en: Department:MSc in Applied Geology、PhD in Applied Geology only.
